title: New: A. K. Paul – Watchin’ U
content:
With the much hyped re-emergence of the Paul brothers over the past few weeks, it’s easy to forget that they’ve only actually officially released one track over the course of the past three or four years.

Sending blogs into meltdown, Landcruisin’ upped the game yet again, and earned Anup the praise that he so rightly deserves for his genre bending production. Anyway, during Mura Masa’s AP Sound Beats1 takeover the other night (which, if you missed it, was on another level), he dropped an unreleased snippet of a demo from A. K. Paul – titled Watchin’ U. Very rare.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
